attributes.action: Totally dispense with, not temporarily waive, the bonus system, the 'reward for failure' culture and the exhorbitant severance pay deals that exist within the British banking and allied corporate business systems whilst tax payers money is being used to save the jobs of those whose incompetence and reckless disregard led to the bail out in the first place.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Totally dispense with, not temporarily waive, the bonus system, the 'reward for failure' culture and the exhorbitant severance pay deals that exist within the British banking and allied corporate business systems whilst tax payers money is being used to save the jobs of those whose incompetence and reckless disregard led to the bail out in the first place."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19955


Prime Minister's Office
